item.title: The Post/Page Template
item.author: R.J. Lorimer
item.description:
Feeling Responsive shows metadata by default. The default behaviour can be changed via config.yml. To show metadata at the end of a page/post just add the following to front matter:

show_meta: true

If you don’t want to show metadata, it’s simple again:

show_meta: false

item.title: Breadcrumbs
item.author: R.J. Lorimer
item.description:
WARNING: If you use breadcrumbs be aware, that if you use categories, you need pages for those categories. If not, the link in the breadcrumb won't work.

Front Matter Code

breadcrumb: true
